info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 31 at 7:27PM PDT until August 31 at 7:45PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM PDT FOR CENTRAL CLARK COUNTY... At 725 PM PDT, thunderstorms with strong outflow winds were moving east at 25 mph, located about 5 miles northeast of Nipton. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs and trees and blowing dust. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Clark County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Las Vegas.
